About Us

As an athlete, or non-athlete, your hand grip and forearm strength involve almost every facet of your training and daily life. Our slogan is "Your body benefits during a workout, so too should your hands."

Fitkora is committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of quality products to help you reach your fitness goals.
